snippet: Also, The Burlington Free Press fights for readers, social media can help or hurt a brand, Microsoft sends its engineers to high school and e-books expand to serialized fiction.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: The Passing of a Times Giant, and Talk of Liberal Bias
